title: A manifeste detection of the notable falshed of that part of Iohn Frithes boke whiche he calleth his foundacion, and bosteth it to be inuincible: newly set foorthe by Iohn Gwinneth clerke.
author: Gwynneth, John.
publisher: [In Fletestrete in the hous of Thomas Berthelet],
notes: A reply to Frith, John.  A boke made by John Frith prisoner in the tower of London (STC 11381).
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
